lines.text: [Buck is pointing a shotgun at Blade]

[points to his head]
If you're gonna shoot me... it better be here.

[points to his heart]
Or here. Anyplace else, asshole, and I will kill you slowly.
You made a big mistake, Matthews. Never scratch dry shit!

[to Buck]
Doing that time in there didn't do a damn thing for you, did it? You were an asshole then and you're a 'bigger' asshole now!
